articles.title: Harvard sues the Trump administration in escalating confrontation - The Washington Post
articles.description: Lawsuit argues that government actions, including freezing $2.2 billion in federal funding, violated the First Amendment and didn’t follow legal procedures.
articles.content:
Harvard University sued the Trump administration in federal court Monday, the latest move in the escalating feud between the nations wealthiest school and the White House.
